name: Rainbow Macarons
title: Rainbow Macarons
desc: Small, multicolored little pastries. Their crispy outer shell packages a sweet, soft center, each refined to perfection.\nThere is a saying in Fontaine that "a dessert spread without macarons is like having the many waters bereft of their source."

skills.desc:
Heal the target character for 1 HP. The next 3 times this character takes DMG, they will also heal 1 HP afterward.
(A character can consume at most 1 Food per Round)
